intro:
This app does not keep your photos or information.

I will only receive your emotions report without user identification for artistic purposes.

Click the button if you are ok and want to proceed
share-thoughts: share your thoughts with the artist
camera: The app will take a picture and a screenshot every minute
dash-sad: This is your saddest moment. Life is hard. We know.
dash-happy: This is your happiest moment. What a lovely face.
